ip.bk: The Acts of the missionaries of Yeshua the Messiah
The Good Message according to Luke

ip: , and unlike most other Bibles, the
places these two accounts one after the other.

The main purpose of this account is to tell about the actions of the first followers of Yeshua the messiah. The spirit of the master helped them to proclaim good message about him “in Yerusalem and all across
Yudea and Samaria, and all the way to the furtherest parts of the planet” (1:8).
This document has three divisions related to the expanding circles as the good message from Yeshua the messiah spread wider and wider: (1) In
where the believers start to get organised after Yeshua ascended up into the clouds; (2) the work and the message spreads wider out to all of the district of
; and (3) spreading more widely again around the Mediterranean Ocean and all the way to

meta.ip: It's also documented here about how God's spirit came to the believers as they were together in a room in Yerusalem at the Festival of Pentecost (fifty days after The Passover). The spirit helps and gives wisdom and strength to the believers and teachers of believers.
